mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectGodMovi Generator(Generator) 2018-06-05 */ GOD_NO , MOVI_TP_CD , MOVI_SIZE_CD , MOVI_TURN , MOVI_KND_CD , MOVI_URL , RPRST_MOVI_YN , MOVI_DSCR , MOVI_APRV_YN , MOVI_USE_YN , MOVI_LAST_UDT_DT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM GOD_MOVI WHERE 1 = 1 AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MOVI_TP_CD = #{moviTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MOVI_SIZE_CD = #{moviSizeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MOVI_TURN = #{moviTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
